paper_abstract: In this paper, we determine some stability results concerning the general mixed additive-cubic equation f(kx + y) + f(kx - y) = kf(x + y) + kf(x - y) + 2f(kx) - 2kf(x) in F-spaces, and generalized related results in reference in different aspects.
paper_title: Stability of a general mixed additive-cubic equation in F-spaces
